title: Beginner Ski Lesson
description: New to skiing and don’t know where to start? Come take a ski lesson! Our ski coach Logan will take you through every step necessary to familiarize yourself with the Nordic Sport Cross Country Skiing from how to put on your skis all the way to how to ski up a hill. Our coaching staff believes in positivity and hands on learning. Most importantly, we’ll show you how to have fun with skiing, so there’s no more frustration. Miles and smiles are ahead with our 1 hour beginner lesson.
